website_summaries.verdict: Rugged option that combines a strong quality build with a full set of outdoor features.
pros: Includes a GPS, moon phase calendar, sunrise alert, weather trend alert, and red back light for nighttime use
cons: Step counter was not accurate for some users

customer_reviews.title: Ok watch. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So the watch is pretty good. Somewhat easy to use. Battery life lasted about 2 to 3 weeks depending on how I used it. Witch is long then my garmin tactix. The watch is very comfortable to where. The screen is ok. But could be better. I added a screen protector on it. Kinda sucks but leaving it on for now. Far as pricing I don’t think it’s worth the money. Catch it on sale like I did. And the app sucks. If you can get around without using the app then it’s fine. Other then that it’s not a bad watch.
customer_reviews.author: trey

customer_reviews.title: Not All of the Features Work
customer_reviews.text: The Traverse Alpha must interface with Suunto's website "Movescount.com" in order to use all the features the watch claims to have. The website is very poor and can not connect with my watch. For example, the latest glitch is that the site requires javascript to be enabled. Mine is, always has been, but still not connection and the same error message. I don't know of a similar product that works better, but you should certainly AVOID Suunto watches if you plan on using them in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I love this watch. It’s one of my favorites. I use it every day I’m in the field (3 times a week) I’m talking rough off road no trail rucks. I am a little disappointed with the quality. It’s a plastic housing. Which makes it light weight but it doesn’t feel that durable. Although it has held up against some pretty harsh situations. So I guess the plastic housing is a matter of preference. I feel it’s not worth the price for the functionality though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Short

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very solid build. Battery life is unbelievably good. I've become addicted to mapping out different trails for hiking and the mountain bike. Not pictured but the red light backlight feature for night mode looks very cool in person. If you're like me have a tendency to smash delicate things then you won't have to worry with this one because it is rock solid all around. Especially love the feature in which you save waypoints along your trail and the watch will beep and tell you that you are approaching that marker which really comes in handy when you want to keep flowing on the bike and you just glance down and look at where you want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and it does exactly what I need it for.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this watch. Being a hunter that travels the world, this gives me all sorts of useful data. The one minor ding I have against it is that even with the contrast adjusted to 100% I still have a bit of a hard time seeing the display. I run the display inverted now with the background black and when I can't see it, I hit the illumination button and I can see it just fine. I do wish it were easier to swap out watch bands too, you must cut the band pin to change the bands out... But I still love it enough to give it a 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: Military Arms Channel

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked all the features and the cool face of this watch. First issue, like many others mentioned, was the smell of the watch band. I contacted Suunto and they suggested I woul purchase a diferent one for $75, this after I already spe.nt $575 for the watch. Connecting to your computer is finiky and and it stopped working at all after 2 years when the battery would last only 5 days. I gave up finnaly on this Suunto after I hit my arm on a shelf and the plastic mold broke where the telescopic rod connects on one side. 0 Stars from me. way too many problems.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Great watch unsure as to display saying watch name and locked up? Will report
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the watch formed firmware update work perfectly now couple weeks later and my display simply States sanudo has anyone else had this issue? Nevertheless it's a tough accurate long battery life great watch and hopefully I just got a dud
customer_reviews.author: sRose

customer_reviews.title: SUUNTO traverse alpha
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned an Apple 3 watch, SUUNTO core, and a Garmin Forerunner 235. The watch is simple but has a lot of great features. It has a rugged bezel which is resistant to scuffing and damage. The battery life is prob one of the best out of all of my previous watches and it recharged which eliminates the need to open the watch. If you’re into hunting, fishing or hiking this watch could be a great tool for you. It works great for marking way points and displaying useful information. Definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine, and lighter than it looks, but I’ve returned it primarily because the visibility isn’t good enough for me. Additionally, for $300+ watch, I’d like to not to have to replace the band with an alternative (the suunto silicone unit) right out of the gate. The user interface and connectivity with the movescout app, also is a bit clunky (there are two apps in the ios app store – pick the ‘movescount’ one).
customer_reviews.author: Frank The Tank

customer_reviews.title: Its great, for 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch with tons of features for anyone liking the outdoors. Mine developed a display problem about a month prior to the warranty expiring. I filed a warranty claim and provided the dated proof of purchase from Amazon and sent it to the repair center. They called and stated the warranty was expired (it was not) and wanted around 30 dollars to fix it. I paid them and the watch was returned ,display was great. Since then, it randomly chimes the storm warning (about 2x a day). other than that its great! I would say if You dont mind spending 350 dollars on a watch every couple years, buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend based on my
customer_reviews.text: Watch broke on third day of use and my experience with Suunto customer service was awful. would not recommend based on my expirience
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK watch but for what you pay it seems you could get more features elsewhere. The durability is questionable, I tripped and fell while fishing and the watchband broke. When the device is recording it lags between button pushes, sometimes having to press the buttons multiple times to get what you needed. The worst thing for me is the advertised shot marker. It has never worked for me. Also the Suunto software is just awful. I would steer away and go with Garmin if I could do it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hunter

customer_reviews.title: It’s OKAY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with hopes it would be at the level of a Casio Mudmaster. But I was severely disappointed with its menu, and ability to scroll through its functions. Also, the apps are not specific for this model, and they are terrible! Suunto needs to step up with a better, clean app that simply covers geo map with locations. Also, I went out to the range with the watch, and it “did not” recognize shots and mark them on a map. Confused, and disappointed. But it sure does look cool... lol
customer_reviews.author: CaliConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears it every day and LOVES it. I enjoy because he set a sunset timer. It's hard to miss one now!
customer_reviews.author: KaCeeB

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I've only had it for three months but very pleased with it. Just a few days after getting it, I accidentally left it sitting outside (lake and water sports activities) on a wooden table, face up in direct sunlight for 10 hrs. It was 98 degrees and 91% humidity. The watch was very hot to the touch when I found it and I was concerned that much direct sun and heat could possibly damage the small internal working pieces. Thankfully, it didn't. Three months later, it has worked perfectly with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David Cash

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Watch continually gets gps activated by bending my wrist. Battery doesn’t last an entire day. Incredibly disappointed. My wife misplaced box or I would return. Absolutely do not recommend. Almost three hundred dollars for nothing. Will never use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Limited tracking options
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch for its simplicity and looks, functional wise it would be great for out in the field or hiking. But day to day use and tracking my steps, the paired mobile apps do not track your steps but only upload recorded activities. I returned this item because it did not upload steps to the mobile app on my phone, suunto said in 2017 it was looking to add step tracking functionality but this has not occurred for this model at this time
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: CLEARLY NOT A NEW WATCH/DISPLAY DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: When I received this watch the box was clearly not new and even had tears/damage to it. I'm assuming the watch is refurbished or something. The display was so dim that you could barely read it. Made all the proper adjustments in the setting while on the phone with SUUNTO; still didn't correct the problem. Not what you expect when ordering a $300.00 watch; Sending watch back, won't order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This watch looks and works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing and looks great all the features as far as ABC functions work flawlessly and are extremely accurate and the battery life is incredible! You will definitely feel confident while wearing this watch if you ever need to navigate or know if bad weather is coming due to its crazy accurate storm alarm feature. I would highly recommend this watch
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  Built great.  Band isn't ideal but still high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great general purpose watch. It's well constructed and has no issues. I did get a face protector for it and a silicon band. It does all of the basics for an outdoor, every day watch and works with other apps like strava.
customer_reviews.author: ElUrbanoBuho

customer_reviews.title: ... it for a few days and so far it's fantastic. I haven't had the connectivity issues that others ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few days and so far it's fantastic. I haven't had the connectivity issues that others seem to be reporting with the associated app/software (I have a google Pixel). As a prime member, I also opted to purchase a used (like new) product for the first time and it came without a charging cable.. I wish Amazon would have caught that. Outside of Amazon's error, I'm happy with the watch despite only testing it's features on a preliminary level. I'll update as it I get more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Waffle

customer_reviews.title: It's the best most incredible watch he's ever owned not to mention ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband after he read about it. It's the best most incredible watch he's ever owned not to mention it's the most handsome piece of jewelry he's ever owned. Gets compliments on it every day. He uses it to hunt fish hike and everything else pretty much. I finally convinced him to download the manual where he found even more functions he didn't know about. Great tool, great timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Suunto watch, and its a solid performer. It does everything as advertised. My only con is that my eyes aren't perfect, and reading anything on the watch face as text or emails come in are impossible for me, the black block text against the dark grey background doesn't contrast enough for me to see it clearly. I also love the red backlight, but it's very low, you won't see much here either. Those two things aside, the watch looks and feels great to wear, and again does everything I could ask it to do.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Build
customer_reviews.text: This watch replaced my EDC (every day carry) 2002 Suunto Advisor ABC watch (pre GPS). As a fly fisherman I love its relevant features. This is a rugged, handsome wrist computer that is comfortable to wear all day. One note to others is that even with maximum display contrast the screen is difficult to see (with my 64 year-old eyes) without engaging the backlight. Now I don't have to carry a separate handheld GPS unit into the field.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pouliot

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic and will BREAK!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is somewhat feature enriched BUT, the strap pins are stronger than the material of the actual watch. I Was folding up a lawn chair in my driveway and the watch itself caught on the chair and Bent the pin and totally ruined the watch or the pin hooks into the watch itself. The plastic on the watch is cheap and no good. Even if the manufacture replaces it it will still have the same problem and it is no good. Very disappointed in Suunto!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stark

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Had it for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had it for a few months now. Easy to use except compass gets weird in a vehicle,( expected) . Band is durable and battery life is good. Charges fast and works well with your phone. Could use a little tweaking in the software, but overall. It has performed as stated.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Lightweight and not too big given it’s function. Easy to use and read. Love the foliage color. Band is a nice weight, functions well and should fit most wrists both big and small fine. Didn’t think I’d like the Bluetooth link to my phone for alerts but it is nice to have. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like for his equipment to be overly complicated or too ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my spouse who is an avid dove hunter and an overall traditionalist. He doesn't like for his equipment to be overly complicated or too flashy. He LOVES this watch. Its durable, accurate and useful. He never showed any interest in wearing a watch however he quoted "but I also didn't know anything like this existed."

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing watch. It is also not your basic, normal smart watch. You can get alerts (anything you’ve allowed for notifications on your phone) from your phone on it. (Must sync it with app). The basic startup for the watch is simple. For more in-depth, read user guide. All in all. Great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome`
customer_reviews.text: I got to replace my Ambit 3 that got stolen. No regrets. The band is awesome and seems tougher than the rubber, the only thing to be aware of (and this is in no way a knock on the product) the button-ology is different from the ambit. I also really like the red backlight for when I am on night patrols (military) and I don't have to worry about white lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Built good. Thats about it
customer_reviews.text: A so so watch. Very innacurate readings. Sea level at my house varies from 2 to 5 to 20 ft and same thing at work. Even the time within a month is off by atleast five mins. Ive never seen a watch off by five mins in a month. Would of expected a little more from suunto. Guess its time to try a garmin. Doesnt always connect
customer_reviews.author: M Hays

customer_reviews.title: 24 mm strap width
customer_reviews.text: I hunt, I fish, and I hike, this is the perfect watch for the outdoors... waiting for the Spring to get the most use out of it, and it looks awesome... I put a black NATO strap on it but the 2 piece strap it comes with is very nice. By the way it has a 24 mm strap width
customer_reviews.author: Carcosa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch for the outdoor enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Watch. I don't want a smart watch that dies in a day. This watch is semi smart and does all the things I want it to do and still has battery at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.author: William Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I own
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch a five star rating although some of its features were less than ideal. All and all I am very pleased with this purchase. Seems to be made very well and attractive to look at for a military, sporting style watch. I love the features that would meet the needs of most sportsman and hikers.
customer_reviews.author: eosguy

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch.
customer_reviews.text: All the features I loved with my old Suunto and some great new ones. I was very frustrated with the Apple Watch and the crap battery life. This thing does what I need and I don't have to charge it but once every other week. Unless I use gps for a good trail run or hike.
customer_reviews.author: D. Quear

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, accurate and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I love all the features...but the instructions are little difficult to understand as far s using it as GPS and tracker. Had to watch several YouTube vids to gain better understanding. However, now that I do, it is fairly straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: JGB

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is getting very sad!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did not send the charger with a watch that lasts 2 weeks without a charge!
customer_reviews.author: T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Badass watch
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome watch. This thing is bullet proof And has tons of features. The strap looks badass but not very comfy, I’m buying the silicone strap to try that. Don’t hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing watch. Most 'altitude, temperature and compass' functions work OK at best. this watch is absolutely accurate. Easy to use and is amazingly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: paul shock

customer_reviews.title: App Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I tried on both latest versions of iPhone and Android and the Suunto app is basically useless. I asked Suunto Support about the lack of content/controls via app and was attempted to be up sold because the app has more features with their better(more expensive) models. I Bought a cheaper watch that isn't advertised but easily better then any other watch you will find via search results. The Coros Apex is amazing for the price. Returned the Suunto after the up sale attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Verticx

customer_reviews.title: Purpose Built
customer_reviews.text: Great gps watch. Accurately tracks your hikes. Breadcrumb/backtrack feature great for exploring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A man’s watch. Period!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I’ve always been a mechanical watch person. However, the utility and versatility of this watch is fantastic. I bought it for hiking and outdoor activities but I’ve hesitated to take it off since I got it. I only hope it passes the test of time. I’ll eventually update my review depending how it does. I wish it interfaced with MyFitnessPal, but I’m sure that would be remedied at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Caliguy 800

customer_reviews.title: Display stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine for the first 3 months I owned and today the display just stopped working. Doesn't appear to be a way to return it so I will have to deal with the wonderful Suunto company and hope they fix it or I am out a watch. I will never buy another Suunto after this. The first one had issues and now this new Traverse Alpha just stops working?? DO NOT BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Loved it wife didn't do to missing function
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few Sunttos over the years woth no issues. Actually this one was for my wife she liked it but we ended up sending it back because she wanted one with heart rate monitoring. Still overall satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Huge hunk of shit!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is ok, but it's big and does not fit well with a long sleeve shirt. You have to keep the watch locked so you don't change screens; so at night you have to unlock it to read the time. It has a ok gps and I have used it a lot as a hiking guide. I would not solely use the gps alone unless it was an emergency. The temp on the watch only works if the watch is off your wrist. I have worn this for about 14 months now and I can't wait to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Time drifts a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this watch. At first it worked well but in the last six months or so it can't keep time. In as little as a week it drifts 7 to 8 minutes off. It requires constant resetting with GPS time to stay accurate. For the amount of money I paid for this watch, it's just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Son in the Army and finds it very helpful on hikes/rucks
customer_reviews.author: Greg Adams

customer_reviews.title: I ordered an Traverse Graphite silicon bank as the cloth NATO type wasn't comfortable. Now I got a great Combination and might .
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Suunto the first one that is GPS. I ordered an Traverse Graphite silicon bank as the cloth NATO type wasn't comfortable. Now I got a great Combination and might I add the band is plenty long for my big 8 inch plus wrist. My first Suunto is now 10 years old and still working great. This watch syncs outdoor with the Satellites or indoors with my iPhone running Moveslink. I am a 75 year old guy who didn't buy it for Hunting or running etc. I just appreciate quality time pieces and this is a dandy,
customer_reviews.author: Jim Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Husband win.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. Even though the battery life dies the faceplate still shows to time. It holds battery about 12 days like it states. Unless you use it more throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Missing one big feature.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have feed schedules so could not use. It was a gift I bought for someone and they couldn’t use it. Very costly gift to have collect dust.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep very good time
customer_reviews.text: The watch works pretty well except for keeping time. It seems to gain 2-3 seconds per day. I wish it would automatically turn on the GPS occasionally to get the correct time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: For a $300 trekking watch, it's a decent bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Tough and comfortable. If you allow the battery to die you have to reprogram the time and most if not all of your personal settings. Haven't saved any routes or waypoints yet so I have no idea if they'd endure. The battery doesn't last as long as it should when its only being used as a time piece. The battery also takes much longer to charge than my other Suunto. I won't be returning it but so have some adjusting to do.
customer_reviews.author: craig mellinger

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a son who is big into hunting and fishing and getting out into the back woods. This is the watch for all of that. I wish the battery was a bit longer life, but the watch is great!
customer_reviews.author: Dan  Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoors watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, wear it all the time. Battery will last almost 2 weeks depending on the functions being used. Heavy GPS the battery will last a day. The watch is durable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Butler

customer_reviews.title: Poor notification system.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Communication with phone absolutely sucks compared to my Apple Watch. Could have done much better. Hard to see the screen with polarized sunglasses. Other than that, love it. Replaced the strap with leather from 02 straps to make it nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Tough and awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Reminds me of my Ambit. Always been happy with Suunto. My only gripe, is when time olis locked, you can't access the light or any other functions. Also, while unlocked, it easily switches to compass or something else. Very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: SageOne

customer_reviews.title: Just a couple of flaws
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about the watch are the bogus weather alerts (which I turned off) and the fact that I can be sitting still and the pedometer accumulates. Other than that, it is a fine watch for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Porter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because I owned a Suunto Core, which was really terrible. The strap was cheap and broke, and the compass was so terribly inaccurate I wouldn't trust it at all. Suunto seemed to fix all of their problems with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the foliage and got the black and red.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the wrong watch. I purchased a Suunto Traverse Alpha foliage and received the black and red. Bummed because it's not the watch I wanted. I chose the the foliage because the black and red looked too similar to my Samsung s3 frontier.
customer_reviews.author: Corey McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Need it if you do hiking
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband birthday gift. He does like hiking , he always compliment it after each hiking. It is accurate and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: FINCH

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, hard to see
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this watch. Features are great but the display leaves a lot to be desired. Very hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: AmyThrasher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Lost it in the winter woods of north idaho and it kept its battery even after a cold night and fresh snow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goemmel

customer_reviews.title: Way over designed! You need a PhD to fully understand the concepts of this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I have a master's degree, but you will need a PhD to use this watch. Sit down in front of YouTube and take notes because that is only way to understand this watch. Nope not joking about the over designed concept of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Best smart watch on the market
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite and best smart watch. I've had about a dozen. The capabilities and battery life are the best on the market right now. Up to 14 days if you aren't using your GPS to mark/plot points. I have gotten many compliments about how nice the watch looks at work. Looks great in a suit, and in casual clothes. I'm happy with my decision purchasing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This watch does it all! I purchased this watch for my husband for Christmas and I have to say it’s the best surprise I’ve ever given him! He loves to exercise, hunt and fish. This watch is perfect for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy smartwatch.
customer_reviews.text: Suunto quality and craftmanship. Good looking piece that seems to be built like a tank. Highly functional and accurate. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto G. Lopez Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few months - wonky menus and difficult to sync with app.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoors tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch! It takes some getting used to but overall, it has great features. My altimeter keeps having to be adjusted, that's why I give it a four star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dri

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Suunto. Vector, Ambit peak 3 sport and now the traverse alpha. Suunto makes quality digital watches and has lots of features i dont even know how to use it. But, like the gps, miles i used when i do mountain bike. its really accurate! Prices are reasonable and much better that other brands i think.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be like new but missing part
customer_reviews.text: The watch was listed as “like new”. It seems to be in good cosmetic condition however it came without a usb charging cable. It is not charged and I can’t test it out. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: One tough watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! There is going to be a steep learning curve so be prepared going in. The bezel will also serve to scratch many things you don’t want it to like the edge of my car door, walls and doorway openings if you are not careful. This Watch seems indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, terrible band.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great. Lots of useful funtions for what I do. The band... Garbage. As you can see from the picture the watch band actually cut my wrist several times. This was from hiking about 6 miles. Get a replacement silicone band.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great Navigation Watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch is exactly what I was looking for. However as previous reviewers stated it’s a little difficult to navigate the settings. Watch face is a tad over sized but over the watch is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Liked almost everything. Is pretty large, the beep is annoying but vibration not noticeable enough when beep is turned off. Overall, liked it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Best watch for hiking and hunting. Is an older model so be aware of product support. Meets all my navigation and recording needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under 4 months. New record for my dead suunto collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in late april and is already broke. Will not take a charge and i bought 2 extra bands. I have 4 or 5 dead suunto watches from last 5 years. They used to let you send them in and have them updated or re-worked. They do not do that and zero customer service. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joe olenwine

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome! The menus and setup are not as intuitive as I would like but once your get used to it you’ll love it. Tough, smart, and accurate everything you need when outdoors
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Just a good all around good watch for the outdoorsman! Was surprised by how long the charge on the battery last
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: great design.
customer_reviews.text: Traverse rocks Used on a ski trip and the climate indicators were helpful to keep on weather changes. Elevation readings were helpful as well. Using the app in conjunction make this easier as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: It would be helpful for outdoor activities. It's a good product and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great I love it I receive text and call notifications and the gps is on point. I’m a tech guy who loves to hunt and hike. Great watch well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this watch is VERY obnoxious about technology (and everything else) so the fact that he loves this watch is a major statement.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick r Lerud

customer_reviews.title: Not as intuitive as expected
customer_reviews.text: Compared to a Garmin I had before (which two took a dump so I tried the Suunto) it isn't quite as intuitive. other than that seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: dan sprague

customer_reviews.title: THIS is a REAL spartan's Watch
customer_reviews.text: You don't need explanation for this. this is how a watch should always look, feel and behave. I could add some features and updates. but that's it. The says "a men's watch" makes a lot of sense and feel with this Smartwatch. a great partner for Adventurous souls. very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kokito

customer_reviews.title: Rugged-Tough-Bombproof
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and outdoorsy features for hunters and fishermen. A touch of modern for those techy folks who enjoy message notifications. Also, many features for those active souls while in pursuit of their fitness goals.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lovaas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch with lots of functions. The red screen is nice for hunting
customer_reviews.author: A Chia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH !!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears it every day for the past few weeks. It was easy to figure out. It's very durable and user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Norris

customer_reviews.title: The GPS function is great especially when I enter uncharted areas while hunting
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for quite some time now it is my go to watch when doing any outdoor activities. The GPS function is great especially when I enter uncharted areas while hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Battery is not very strong
customer_reviews.text: Watch is ok. Graphics are minimal, buttonology is a bit annoying. Battery life is terrible, don’t forget your charger if you go to the field/hiking and use navigation - you will need a solar paneleiro potable battery to charge this thing. It’s ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L-Boogie

customer_reviews.title: The BEST watch on Earth!
customer_reviews.text: This is a MANS watch. period. Does everything I want it to. Been buying Suunto watches ever since I was in the Marines. But the Traverse Alpha is currently the BEST. In summery, One word. BombProof.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy strap but great watch
customer_reviews.text: Hate the band love the watch. Would prfer different band option like silicone or metal this is just a flimsy strap
customer_reviews.author: Derick boehme

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Easy to read and great for hiking, hunting, and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possible damage or not 100% perfect upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and found actual dust particles underneath the glass at the 1 o’clock. Brand new never worn or even turned on. Decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love the device
customer_reviews.text: Love the device... does everything I want. However, there is an inclusion in the glass that while does not interfere with the function of the device, it is annoying but less so then having to return it and set up a new one.
customer_reviews.author: colorolo

customer_reviews.title: Simple and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: So when deciding between these types of watches I chose this one because of the simplicity in the face and functions. Other watches have the LCD screen and touch screen capabilities, but as the title states I like simple. The battery life is excellent and the different features like the compass and barometer are useful for my line of work.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Hiking tracker!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift. Receiver of said gift is soo pleased with this watch/gps. Trails and how high we go...i hear it all the time. It really is a great tool for off trail hiking. Keeps us from getting lost in the Superstition Mtns. :) very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sheton

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband’s birthday and he absolutely loves it. I would recommend getting a screen protector for it when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Dynel Mackelprang

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Charged the watch once and it worked great. After a week the batteries died. It charges but will not turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Samson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. App works well transfers data to all running apps. More of an outdoors watch then a fitness watch. Extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who is in the military and he wears it everywhere and has been able to use it partially for work. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bonnye Ellertson

product_meta.title: Suunto Traverse Alpha
product_meta.description:
GO EXPLORE 
Suunto Traverse Alpha combines strong build quality with a full set of outdoor features. It is your guide in the wild, keeping you on track with GPS/GLONASS navigation. Specific fishing and hunting features provide useful tools for your activity, including moon phase calendar, shot detection, sunrise alert, weather trend, and red backlight for nighttime use. Plan your routes and keep a diary of your fishing and hunting trips with Suunto's Movescount.com. 
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS Master your territory with GPS/GLONASS navigation Dedicated functions for fishing, hunting and hiking Made in Finland, tested to military standards 
TESTED TOUGH 
Every new Suunto product goes through rigorous testing during development both in the laboratory and out in the field. In addition to our internal testing, we let independent test laboratories put our products to the limit. See how Suunto Traverse was tested according the military standards (MIL-STD-810G). Watch the video now. 
EY FEATURES Hiking, Fishing and Hunting modes Sunrise-sunset times and alerts Fishing and hunting specific POI types Red backlight, Night Vision Goggle compatible GPS and GLONASS for route and POI navigation Real-time breadcrumb view of the recorded track Tracking for speed, distance and altitude Route planning in Suunto's Movescount.com with topographic maps Route preview and route altitude profile on the watch Weather trend and storm alarm Compass Backlight in flashlight mode Vibration alarm GPS time update Daily, weekly, monthly and yearly activity tracking of steps and calories Mobile notifications Compatible with Suunto Movescount App (iOS) 
Please note: Android compatibility Traverse Alpha will be added in the next Android release. The release is currently being tested and some additional fixes are needed before it can be released. We apologize for the delay in the availability of the Android support.
feature_bullets: Features a rugged, knurled stainless steel bezel, durable water repellent nylon strap, and a premium scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass
Suunto's automatic shot detection technology keeps track of when and where you shoot, mapping the GPS coordinates of your location for later viewing
Gps tracks your path, helping you find your way back using the automatic breadcrumb trail,Compatible with Suunto Movescount App (iOS and Android)
Location based moon Phase calendar with moon rise and moon set times helps you determine the best hunting and fishing times. Operating temperature 20° C to +60° C / 5° F to +140° F
Suunto Traverse Alpha watches are handmade in Finland. Battery type rechargeable lithium ion. Battery life In time mode 14 days. Training mode with GPS 10, 15, 100 h

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
